revised_title: An Account of the Devonian Fish Palæospondylus Gunni Traquair
tldr: The authors describe the study of the Devonian fish Palæospondylus Gunni Traquair using serial polished surfaces, a method that provides a permanent record of the fossil. They discuss the fish's anatomy, comparing it to other species, and present evidence of the transformation of bone into coal in the fossilization process.
